name: Case breaching 2 days send Slack Notification to Case Owner and Channel
description: When there is a scheduled object search using SOQL query in Salesforce, do action and other actions

code.name: scheduled_sobject_soql_query
code.title: Scheduled Case search using SOQL
code.description: Scheduled Case search using SOQL query in Salesforce

input.conditions: ="TLMD__c <= "  + 2.days.ago.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT23:59:59.000000+00:00")  +" AND TLMD__c >= " +7.days.ago.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT23:59:59.000000+00:00")+" AND Status IN ('In Progress', 'Investigation', 'Waiting on Customer', 'With Customer Success Management') ORDER BY TLMD__c DESC"

block.name: search_sobjects_soql
block.title: Search Users using SOQL
block.description: Search Users using SOQL query in Salesforce

extended_input_schema.name: include_combined_attachments
extended_input_schema.label: Select combined attachments
extended_input_schema.hint: Select Yes to obtain data from notes, attachments and files associated to the queried records. Default value is Yes.

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Search by
extended_input_schema.hint: Provide one or more entry fields to search the entry

block.description: Call recipe POST_SLACK_MESSAGE (do not wait for response)
